text: It would also be nice if someone on Windows could make sure we haven't bungled something like with RC2

elements.text: It would also be nice if someone on Windows could make sure we haven't bungled something like with RC2

text: What do I need to do? My employer has finally decided to remove Cisco AMP antivir, and we're only using Windows Defender now which means my work machine should again be roughly representative of the modal Windows user!
